verses.text: Work when the morning shineth, Work when the noon-day gleams, Work with a heart rejoicing, Work with a need to mind, Work till the sun goeth down, Work with the hosts at rest;
Work when the day declined, Work with the last sweet beams, Work for the pure and holy, Work for the true and grand, So shall thy nights be blessed.

chorus.text: Work (and) watch (and) pray, Work for the day will soon be gone; Work (and) watch (and) pray, Soon will the Master come.
